question: What courses are offered?
answer: CMRIT offers UG, PG, and PhD programs in engineering, management, and science. More at https://www.cmrit.ac.in/all-programmes/

question: Tell me about the fee structure.
answer: You can view the detailed fee structure here: https://www.cmrit.ac.in/fee-structure

question: How are the placements?
answer: CMRIT has a great placement record! Top companies like Infosys, Wipro, and TCS visit every year.

question: Does it offer PhD programs?
answer: Yes, CMRIT offers PhD programs in engineering, management, and science.
